sentences.en: ...a dark blue baseball cap.
sentences.cn: …一顶深蓝色的棒球帽。

sentences.en: a baseball cap
sentences.cn: 棒球帽

sentences.en: a bottle cap
sentences.cn: 瓶盖

sentences.en: a graceful tower capped with a golden dome
sentences.cn: 一座漂亮的金色圆顶塔

sentences.en: a swimming cap
sentences.cn: 泳帽

sentences.en: Don't put feathers in your own cap.
sentences.cn: 别尽往自己脸上贴金.

sentences.en: Harry'sappointment to this important post was a feather in his cap.
sentences.cn: 哈里被任命担任如此要职，这是件荣耀的事。

sentences.en: He had offered the loan of his small villa at Cap Ferrat.
sentences.cn: 他愿意借出在费拉角的小别墅。

sentences.en: He placed his cap and overcoat on a chair.
sentences.cn: 他把帽子和大衣搁在一张椅子上。

sentences.en: He snapped the cap on his ballpoint.
sentences.cn: 他吧嗒一声把笔帽扣在了圆珠笔上。

sentences.en: He was wearing a cream silk shirt and a tartan golfing cap.
sentences.cn: 他身着一件米色丝绸衬衫，头戴一顶花格子高尔夫球帽。

sentences.en: He wears a cap to cover a spot of baldness.
sentences.cn: 他戴帽以遮斑秃。

sentences.en: He wears his baseball cap back to front.
sentences.cn: 他把棒球帽反戴着。

sentences.en: I'm having "John Law" engraved on the cap.
sentences.cn: 我要在笔帽上刻上JohnLaw。

sentences.en: It was a feather in his cap to win the Nobel Prize.
sentences.cn: 获得诺贝尔奖对他是至高的荣誉.

sentences.en: magnificent cliffs capped by lovely wild flowers
sentences.cn: 崖顶山花烂漫的巍峨峭壁

sentences.en: Make sure you put the cap back on the pen.
sentences.cn: 一定要把笔帽套上。

sentences.en: Please hand me that parcel [those pictures; my cap].
sentences.cn: 请把那包东西[那几张画; 我的帽子]递给我。

sentences.en: Put the cap back on the bottle.
sentences.cn: 把瓶盖盖上.

sentences.en: she was on edge, her nerves taut, and to cap it all, she could feel the beginnings of a headache.
sentences.cn: 她焦躁不安，神经紧张，更糟的是，她感到头开始疼了起来。

sentences.en: The man touched the peak of his cap.
sentences.cn: 那名男子摸了摸他的帽舌。

sentences.en: The nurse wore a pleated cap on her head.
sentences.cn: 护士头上戴着打褶的小帽.

sentences.en: There is a film of mould over the bottle cap.
sentences.cn: 瓶盖上有一层薄薄的霉菌.

sentences.en: They cap when they pass the president.
sentences.cn: 他们经过院长面前时脱帽行礼.

sentences.en: we have to &B{go cap in hand} begging for funds.
sentences.cn: 我们不得不低三下四地四处寻求资金。

sentences.en: Winning the gold medal was a feather in his cap.
sentences.cn: 夺得金牌是他值得自豪的成就.

sentences.en: With a sudden stretch, John took Tom's cap.
sentences.cn: 约翰突然一伸手， 拿走了汤姆的帽子。

words.tran_cn: 无帽的；免盖的；无电容的
封口机；帽商；制造器具的盖子的人；诱饵；装盖的人；托儿
给…戴帽；去蒂；覆以…；除去盖子；胜过（cap的过去分词形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 尊敬地或卑躬地；谦逊地
如果说得有理，就该接受
女追男，挑逗男子：竭力吸引或赢得…使成为配偶

phrases.phrase: set one's cap at (或 美
phrases.tran_cn: (旧)（妇女）设法诱使（某男子）成为求婚者
n. 淋浴时用的塑胶浴帽

trans.tran_cn: 帽子，国家队队员资格，帽，盖
trans.tran_en: a  contraceptive  made of a round piece of rubber that a woman puts inside her  vagina
a  contraceptive  made of a round piece of rubber that a woman puts inside her  vagina

trans.tran_cn: 覆盖，胜过，选入国家队，限定（预算），箍牙
trans.tran_en: to have a particular substance on top
